alert.note: Alert for Coastal Harris; Fort Bend; Inland Brazoria; Inland Galveston; Inland Harris; Montgomery; Waller (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 27 at 7:58PM CDT by NWS Houston - Galveston
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of western Galveston, central Fort Bend, south central Montgomery, north central Brazoria, southeastern Waller and Harris Counties through 845 PM CDT... At 757 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a gust front and scattered thunderstorms along a line extending from near Spring to Greater Greenspoint to Greater Inwood to near Addicks Park Ten to near Katy. Movement was southeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Pasadena, Pearland, western League City, Sugar Land, Baytown, Missouri City, Friendswood, Deer Park, eastern Rosenberg, Alvin, Stafford, South Houston, Bellaire, Humble, West University Place, Katy, Richmond, Galena Park, Jacinto City and Webster. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Coastal Harris; Fort Bend; Inland Brazoria; Inland Galveston; Inland Harris; Montgomery; Waller
